oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leistungsauftrag 2004-2007 an die Stiftung Forschungsinstitut fuer biologischen Landbau (FiBL), Frick; Thema Sozio-Ökonomie
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy

Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: FiBL's activities in the area of socio-econmics centre around agricultural policy, market research and farm economics.
